Arguments.a: We should go to the beach, because it is calmer than skateboarding.
Arguments.b: We should go to the zoo, because it has more animals than the beach.
Arguments.c: We should go to the spa, because it smells better than a zoo.
Arguments.d: We should go to the concert, because it has the best animal, i.e., the human.
Arguments.e: We should go to the restaurant, because we are too hungry to party at a concert.
Arguments.k: We should go to the skate park.
